properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

Spacious four bedroom detached family home located on a quiet residential road. The property features a large open-plan kitchen/dining area, separate living room, downstairs WC and integral garage. Upstairs offers four well-proportioned bedrooms including a master with en-suite, plus a modern family bathroom. The rear garden is well maintained and ideal for entertaining.

Well-presented one bedroom apartment situated close to local amenities and transport links. The property comprises an open-plan living/kitchen area with integrated appliances, a double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and a modern bathroom suite. Ideal for first-time buyers or investors.

Charming two bedroom terraced house offering bright and airy accommodation throughout. The ground floor features a cosy living room and modern fitted kitchen with access to a private rear garden. Upstairs includes two bedrooms and a contemporary bathroom. Conveniently located for schools and public transport.

A spacious three bedroom penthouse apartment offering panoramic views and modern living. The property benefits from a large living/dining area, fitted kitchen, three double bedrooms and two bathrooms. Additional features include allocated parking and lift access.

Impressive five bedroom executive home set within a sought-after private development. The property offers multiple reception rooms, a high-spec kitchen, utility room and study. Upstairs features five bedrooms, two with en-suites, and a luxury family bathroom. Externally there is a double garage and landscaped garden.
